adrFormatAddress: 217 Park Row # 4b, New York, NY 10038-1101, USA

originalText.text: I brought my oldest daughter here for a wisdom tooth extraction. Dr. Cheng was not only very professional, but extremely detail and patient with my daughter and I. Entire staff are all very nice and understanding as well. I really had a great experience, so much that I took my  youngest back for another tooth surgery and now my husband is also seeing Dr. Cheng for a tooth extraction. Dr. Cheng and staff is definitely one of the better dentist practice I’ve seen in past few years

originalText.text:
**A phenomenal experience, couldn’t have been better!**
I was on vacation in New York and had progressively severe pain radiating from my lower jaw. I could tell it was a wisdom tooth trying to ruin my life. I did a search for Oral & Maxillofacial Surgeons near the area I was staying, who received great reviews, and who could take me the same day. I found Dr. Cheng at Chatham Square who set me an immediate appointment. I was terrified.
As soon as I got to the office, I was somehow relieved by his sweet staff who handled my x-rays and pre-op care. When Dr. Cheng came in the room for my consultation, I knew I was safe and that everything was going to be okay. He walked me through the process, told me exactly what was going to happen, and gave me time to ask questions. The extraction was not painful at all and besides the hygienists assisting him, he had a whole team member in the room just to hold my hand!
Dr. Cheng is a wonderfully kind surgeon who personally followed up with me over the next few days to see how I was feeling. I am thrilled with the care I received and will definitely traverse the world to go back if I ever need any related procedures in the future. Thank you Dr. Cheng and team!

originalText.text: Had a coronectomy (partial extraction) of an impacted wisdom tooth with Dr. Ray Cheng. The procedure was quick with minimal discomfort performed in office under local anesthesia. Everything has since healed nicely, with 6 month followup. I can attest to Dr. Cheng's clinical and technical acumen. His office was easy to communicate with for appointments and obtaining X-ray copies for my general dentist. I highly recommend a consultation with Dr. Cheng if you are seeking an oral surgeon.

originalText.text: Friendly staffs! Came here for tooth extraction, afterwards Dr. Cheng would send an email to ask if everything is okay. At the beginning I was very nervous about the tooth implant but then after it was painless. Like!

originalText.text: I had 2 implants performed by Dr. Cheng. Never had a problem since. Great oral surgeon and his staff.
